Posts.Content: Hi Dayityrose,  thanks for your reply it managed to keep my worries at bay for a while. So I went for my first appointment today and was given a treatment plan which starts on 3rd August, I asked about my CT scan results & the doctor said he had spoken to my Consultant earlier and I will have another scan in the next couple of days to check the liver however there was no mention of the esophagus on his report anywhere.  Really strange so I am going to phone BCN tomorrow first thing to see what is going on. Hoping for a good nights sleep tonight. XX  Gracie
Posts.Title: CT Scan results -

Posts.Content: Hi, spoke to a breast nurse this morning explaining the situation. Apparently there is a thickening on the esophagus however they are not overly concerned at this point and will arrange for me to have camera down to check this out. An adendum has been added to my notes and forwarded to Christies. Treatment plan is actually less than BCN said it would be so that was a bit of good news and if all goes to plan last treatment would be 16th Nov. Then I would start on hormone tablets don't know much more about tat at this point. Hope you are keeping well. xx Gracie
